item.title: Configuring org-protocol in AMD build MacOS
item.description: This is a post on configuring org-protocol for people using Emacs on MacOS with AMD chips. The documentary only contains configuration for up to MacOs built on Intel chips. I will also include the steps I have taken to figure the problem out with very limited programming and computer background knowledge. First, load org-protocol.el to the init.el configuration file: 1(server-start) 2(add-to-list 'load-path "~/path/to/org/protocol/") 3(require 'org-protocol) Note that org-protocol.el comes with the org-mode so it’s not in any package archives.
